tool_description: Name matching api - Compares two names and scores for similarity.
name: Nomen Loco
title: Nomen Loco

api_list.name: score
api_list.description: Use the scoring endpoint to score the similarity between two names.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nomen-loco.p.rapidapi.com/nomenloco/v1/score"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nomen-loco.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Keys
api_list.description: This endpoint provides matching keys for getting candidates to score against.  A name will generate several keys, which can then be stored.  When trying to find a name that matches, generate the keys for the name you are looking for, then pull all matching keys from the saved keys.  This provides an efficient lookup mechanism for potential matching candidates.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nomen-loco.p.rapidapi.com/nomenloco/v1/getKeys"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nomen-loco.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
